Hi Folks

I'm trying  yet to generate a fullcantera  1.6.0 exacutablesand u=
tils
under my AMD x86_64 machine. Ihave a trouble and I wouldlike if someon=
e
could help me.

I'm using the  SUSE 10.0 86_64 linux and some adjusts was=
 donne in the
configure file to match as near as possible with my reallity.=
 That is
the results of diff comando between the original and modified conf=
igure
files:

diff configure configure.ori
62c62
< PYTHON_PACKAGE=3D${PYTHO=
N_PACKAGE:=3D"full"}
---

---=

< BUILD_WITH_F2C=3D${BUILD=
_WITH_F2C:=3D"n"}
---
> BUILD_WITH_F2C=3D${BUILD_WITH_F2C:=3D"y"}

ompilation, the part of the make command output including stderr
